item.title: The battle of the champagne widows
item.description:
The battle of the champagne widows

Widows have a special place in the history of Champagne turning around some of the biggest houses, implementing breakthrough changes in the winemaking process and promoting champagne around the world. Here is an article about the most famous champagne widows and a blind tasting of their non-vintage brut champagnes re-posted from the Epicurealist.

item.title: A fly in my champagne!
item.description:
A fly in my champagne!

Champagne is all about having a good time and you can't have a good time without (at least) a little bit of humour. So here's our first dose of champagne humour - a joke that has been around for some time, but we like it a lot, not least because of its international flavour.Â
